name: Kiwi The Koala 2: A Brother's Tale
name_original: Kiwi The Koala 2: A Brother's Tale
description:
This game was developed across two weekends for the GBJam8 Game Jam.

It has been just over a year since little Kiwi the Koala saved her missing family. But now, Kiwi herself has gone missing! It's up to her  brother Karl to find her and bring her home.

Play as Karl the Koala as he sets out to find his little sister Kiwi. But be careful! There's bound to be danger at every turn. Enemy creatures prowl the land. Getting attacked (hit) by them twice will result in the loss of a life. Can Karl stay alive in order to reunite with Kiwi and bring her home?

Utilizing a classic platforming system, a retro pixel art style and the same aspect ratio and colour palettes as the original game boy, Kiwi the Koala 2 is the sequel just one person has asked for.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move left and right.

A Key: Jump and Double Jump.

M Key: Mute/Unmute

Escape Key: Pause the game.

Sourced Assets:

Royalty free music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com

Sound effects from zapsplat.com and freesound.org
